entry.title: Hexo安装环境与常用命令
entry.content: 这里是摘要Abstract Git 环境准备Hexo 环境准备Hexo 常用命令Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 参考文献
